summary.para: The TRUSTED_INFORMATION_CLASS enumeration type defines values that indicate the type of information to set or query for a trusted domain.
Each value has an associated structure that the and functions use to store the information.

member.name: TRUSTED_INFORMATION_CLASS.TrustedDomainNameInformation
member.summary: Query or set the name of a trusted domain. Use the structure.

member.name: TRUSTED_INFORMATION_CLASS.TrustedPosixOffsetInformation
member.summary: Query or set the value used to generate Posix user and group identifiers. Use the structure.

member.name: TRUSTED_INFORMATION_CLASS.TrustedPasswordInformation
member.summary: This value has been superseded by the TrustedDomainAuthInformation value.

member.name: TRUSTED_INFORMATION_CLASS.TrustedDomainInformationEx
member.summary: Query extended information for a trusted domain. Use the structure.

member.name: TRUSTED_INFORMATION_CLASS.TrustedDomainAuthInformation
member.summary: Query authentication information for a trusted domain. Use the structure.

member.name: TRUSTED_INFORMATION_CLASS.TrustedDomainFullInformation
member.summary: Query complete information for a trusted domain. This information includes the Posix offset information, authentication information, and the extended information returned for the TrustedDomainInformationEx value. Use the structure.
